problem.question: To check if your car tire pressure is low, you should:
options: Press down on the tire with your hand - if it feels soft and depresses easily, pressure is low.
Use a tire pressure gauge to measure the exact PSI and compare to recommended pressure.

key_steps: Tire pressure requires precise measurement in PSI
Human touch is subjective and imprecise
Tire pressure gauge provides objective numerical reading
Safety depends on accurate pressure measurement

constraints.description: Tire pressure must be measured accurately for safety
Incorrect pressure affects braking and handling

logic_requirements: Identifies limitations of subjective hand test
